text: minisata yamkisi vipatak langa vana vita, (eya paha karana men prarthana kara), apavama aradhana karannaha. (eya paha kara) ohuta api yamkisi varaprasadayak pahala kalahot nam, “(mage) dænuma maginma ma meya at kara gattemi” yayi pavasanneya. eya (niværadi) nova. eyada (ovunta) eya piriksumaki. ehet ovungen bohomayak dena (meya) dæna ganne næta
